summary: The module defines a collection of unit test functions aimed at verifying DVC's remote experiment capabilities, including authentication error handling, auto‑push configuration, and operations such as listing, pulling, and pushing experiments to remote repositories. Most of the tests are currently unused or not exercised.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of remote experiment management in DVC by testing error scenarios and core remote operations, thereby improving reliability of experiment synchronization across remote storage.
